fr.exanpe.t5.lib.services
Interface LocaleSessionService

All Known Implementing Classes:
LocaleSessionServiceImpl
public interface LocaleSessionService

This interface defines the services offered to manipulate the locale in session (instead of in url). Note that your Locale have to be defined as a contribution of SymbolConstants#SUPPORTED_LOCALES

Since:
1.2
Author:
jmaupoux

Method Summary
 String getLocale()
          Get a locale from the current session
 void setLocale(Locale locale)
          Set a locale in the session.
 void setLocale(String locale)
          Set a locale in the session from name.
 

Method Detail

setLocale

void setLocale(String locale)
Set a locale in the session from name. Automatically restored on request by contributing with LocaleSessionRequestFilter

Parameters:
locale - the locale String. null is allowed.

setLocale

void setLocale(Locale locale)
Set a locale in the session. Uses the toString() value of the Locale class.

Parameters:
locale - the Locale. null is allowed to reset the locale

getLocale

String getLocale()
Get a locale from the current session

Returns:
the locale String, as set by setLocale(String), or null if none
